subject: Implement Audit Logging System
description:
Create comprehensive audit logging for compliance and forensics:
1. Create /home/ken/developer-portal/src/lib/audit.ts
2. Add audit_logs table with: actor_id, actor_type, action, target_type, target_id, metadata, ip_address, user_agent
3. Create logAction() helper function
4. Add middleware to auto-log all mutations
5. Actions to audit: project CRUD, key CRUD/rotate, user invites, role changes, suspensions, secret access
6. Create audit log viewer UI at /dashboard/projects/[slug]/audit
7. Add filtering and export capabilities
